thread.section_title: Dyers RV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dyers RV | dyersonline.com
thread.title: James Brown
thread.title_full: Dyers RV reviewed by James Brown

author: James Brown
title: James Brown
text: Purchased new fabric for my awning on my fifth wheel. Installed it myself and after install found a little bigger than pin hole in it. Called Dyers and they offered to send me a new one but I had already installed it on camper. But was glad they offered to stand behind it. I don't know if it came that way or it happened as I installed it, but glad they cared enough to replace. Shipped out fast and very pleased with them.
